original_text: But those that were sown on the good soil are the ones who hear the word and accept it and bear fruit, thirtyfold and sixtyfold and a hundredfold.”
korean_text: 좋은 땅에 뿌려졌다는 것은 곧 말씀을 듣고 받아 삼십 배나 육십 배나 백 배의 결실을 하는 자니라

sentences.original_text: But those that were sown on the good soil
are the ones who hear the word
thirtyfold and sixtyfold and a hundredfold
sentences.korean_translation: 서른 배, 예순 배, 백 배의 열매를
